segments.pli: Aṅguttara Nikāya 4
segments.en: Numbered Discourses 4

segments.pli: 11. Valāhakavagga
segments.en: 11. Clouds

segments.pli: 110. Āsīvisasutta
segments.en: 110. Vipers

segments.pli: “Cattārome, bhikkhave, āsīvisā.
segments.en: “Mendicants, there are these four kinds of viper.

segments.pli: Katame cattāro?
segments.en: What four?

segments.pli: Āgataviso na ghoraviso, ghoraviso na āgataviso, āgataviso ca ghoraviso ca, nevāgataviso na ghoraviso—
segments.en:
1. One whose venom is fast-acting but not lethal,
  2. one whose venom is lethal but not fast-acting,
  3. one whose venom is both fast-acting and lethal, and
  4. one whose venom is neither fast-acting nor lethal.

segments.pli: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro āsīvisā.
segments.en: These are the four kinds of viper.

segments.pli: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, cattāro āsīvisūpamā puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
segments.en: In the same way, these four people similar to vipers are found in the world.

segments.pli: Katame cattāro?
segments.en: What four?

segments.pli: Āgataviso na ghoraviso, ghoraviso na āgataviso, āgataviso ca ghoraviso ca, nevāgataviso na ghoraviso.
segments.en:
1. One whose venom is fast-acting but not lethal,
  2. one whose venom is lethal but not fast-acting,
  3. one whose venom is both fast-acting and lethal, and
  4. one whose venom is neither fast-acting nor lethal.

segments.pli: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo āgataviso hoti, na ghoraviso?
segments.en: And how is a person’s venom fast-acting but not lethal?

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo abhiṇhaṃ kujjhati.
segments.en: It’s when a person is often angry,

segments.pli: So ca khvassa kodho na dīgharattaṃ anuseti.
segments.en: but their anger doesn’t linger long.

segments.pli: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo āgataviso hoti, na ghoraviso.
segments.en: That’s how a person’s venom is fast-acting but not lethal.

segments.pli: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, āsīviso āgataviso, na ghoraviso;
segments.en: That person is like a viper whose venom is fast-acting but not lethal.

segments.pli: tathūpamāhaṃ, bhikkhave, imaṃ puggalaṃ vadāmi.
Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo ghoraviso hoti, na āgataviso?
segments.en: And how is a person’s venom lethal but not fast-acting?

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo na heva kho abhiṇhaṃ kujjhati.
segments.en: It’s when a person is not often angry,

segments.pli: So ca khvassa kodho dīgharattaṃ anuseti.
segments.en: but their anger lingers for a long time.

segments.pli: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo ghoraviso hoti, na āgataviso.
Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, āsīviso ghoraviso, na āgataviso;
tathūpamāhaṃ, bhikkhave, imaṃ puggalaṃ vadāmi.
Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo āgataviso ca hoti ghoraviso ca?
segments.en: And how is a person’s venom both fast-acting and lethal?

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo abhiṇhaṃ kujjhati.
segments.en: It’s when a person is often angry,

segments.pli: So ca khvassa kodho dīgharattaṃ anuseti.
segments.en: and their anger lingers for a long time.

segments.pli: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo āgataviso ca hoti ghoraviso ca.
Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, āsīviso āgataviso ca ghoraviso ca;
tathūpamāhaṃ, bhikkhave, imaṃ puggalaṃ vadāmi.
Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo nevāgataviso hoti na ghoraviso?
segments.en: And how is a person’s venom neither fast-acting nor lethal?

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo na heva kho abhiṇhaṃ kujjhati.
segments.en: It’s when a person is not often angry,

segments.pli: So ca khvassa kodho na dīgharattaṃ anuseti.
segments.en: and their anger doesn’t linger long.

segments.pli: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo nevāgataviso hoti, na ghoraviso.
Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, āsīviso nevāgataviso na ghoraviso;
tathūpamāhaṃ, bhikkhave, imaṃ puggalaṃ vadāmi.
Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro āsīvisūpamā puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
segments.en: These four people similar to vipers are found in the world.”

segments.pli: Dasamaṃ.
Valāhakavaggo paṭhamo.
Dve valāhā kumbha udaka,
rahadā dve honti ambāni;
Mūsikā balībaddā rukkhā,
āsīvisena te dasāti.

sections.title: “Mendicants, there are these four kinds of viper.
